= ste.selectbox( "How would you like to be contacted?", range(100), key="selectbox",)st.write("You selected:", option)d = ste.date_input("When's your birthday", date(2019, 7, 6), width```pythonimport streamlit as stimport streamlit_ext as stest.title('streamlit-ext')ste.set_page_width("60em")st.write("a quick fox jump..."*100)```
